processingCommand.script:
! Restore modules
:SET &WMS_RESTORE#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_RESTORE#      = "false"
:SET &RW_RESTORE#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_RESTORE#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTORE#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTORE# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_RESTORE#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTORE#  = "false"

:SET &WMS_DB_RESTORE#    = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_RESTORE#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_RESTORE#    = "false"

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &WMS_APP_BACKUP# = &WMS_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &WMS_APP_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:  SET &FAILOVER# = "false"
:  PUBLISH &FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &REFS_APP_BACKUP# = &REFS_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &REFS_APP_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:  SET &FAILOVER# = "false"
:  PUBLISH &FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &RW_APP_BACKUP# = &RW_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &RW_APP_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:  SET &FAILOVER# = "false"
:  PUBLISH &FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &EMS_APP_BACKUP# = &EMS_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &EMS_APP_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:  SET &FAILOVER# = "false"
:  PUBLISH &FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTORE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTORE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_FAIL_RESTORE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTORE# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &WMS_DB_BACKUP# = &WMS_DB_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &REFS_DB_BACKUP# = &REFS_DB_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_RESTORE# = "true"
:  SET &EMS_DB_BACKUP# = &EMS_DB_BACKUP_FILE#
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_RESTORE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &WMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_STOP#      = "false"
:SET &RW_STOP#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_STOP# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_STOP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"

:PUBLISH &WMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &WMS_RESTART# = &WMS_RESTORE#
:SET &REFS_RESTART# = &REFS_RESTORE#
:SET &RW_RESTART# = &RW_RESTORE#
:SET &EMS_RESTART# = &EMS_RESTORE#
:SET &WMS_FAIL_RESTART# = &WMS_FAIL_RESTORE#
:SET &REFS_FAIL_RESTART# = &REFS_FAIL_RESTORE#
:SET &RW_FAIL_RESTART# = &RW_FAIL_RESTORE#
:SET &EMS_FAIL_RESTART# = &EMS_FAIL_RESTORE#

:PUBLISH &WMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RESTART#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &INSTANCE_STOP# = "Y"
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_STOP#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &UPGRADE_EXITCODE# = "1"
:PUBLISH &UPGRADE_EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
